title: Google Pixel Rebooting issue
content: constantly rebooting my Pixel mobile, and problem verified by Google they gave me repairing quotation of 22k. this is awesome joke from google, first buy a high end flagship from google in 50 to 70k and within the 2 years your mobiles motherboard not working or proceeding to die. The same issue was happens with my two of Nexus 5x phones and now i am worrying about my Pixel 2xl. its not worth to buy or suggest mobile from google's Pixel, Nexus or whatever brand.
